entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
